trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> is interrupted while it is in a waiting state.
trans-unit.target: 時擲回的例外狀況<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>處於等候狀態時中斷。

trans-unit.source: After a thread is created, it is in one or more <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> states until it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在建立的執行緒之後，就在一或多個<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>指出它終結之前有效。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A> when a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> state will cause a ThreadInterruptedException to be thrown in the target thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>當執行緒處於<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>的狀態會造成在目標執行緒中擲回 ThreadInterruptedException。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the thread is not in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> state, the exception is not thrown until the thread enters that state.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒不在<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>狀態，直到執行緒會進入該狀態不擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>

trans-unit.source: If the thread never blocks, it could complete without ever being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒永不封鎖，它無法完成沒有插斷。

trans-unit.source: ThreadInterruptedException uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED, which has the value 0x80131519.
trans-unit.target: ThreadInterruptedException 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED，0x80131519 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ThreadInterruptedException, see the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ThreadInterruptedException 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
